projectGridLines.title: Title: Social Media Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Social Media Intern


Description: Execute social media marketing activities for an international B2B SaaS startup. Activities include calendar maintenance, new posts, increasing followership etc…


Skill sets: Great English (Written & Verbal), Communication Skills, Problem Solving, Data Analytics


Traits expectation: Great English (Written & Verbal), Communication Skills, Problem Solving, Data Analytics


Expected learning:  Social Media Marketing for an international B2B SaaS Startup

projectGridLines.title: Business Solution Engineer Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description: 

·        Communicate with clients based in US, Europe & ANZ on a daily basis.

·        Understand business problems and implement solutions by integrating CloudFiles with Salesforce / HubSpot CRMs.

·        Use various technical concepts of CRM solutioning such as widgets, workflows, reports etc… to create solutions for clients.

·        Our clients include some very large brands and you will be in constant touch with their team(s) to implement solutions for them.

 

 

Skill sets: 

Problem Solving, CRM Solutioning, Communication

Expected learning: 

·        How large companies manage their day to day operations using CRM(s)

·        How CloudFiles solves the business documents challenge for these companies

·        How to keep customers of a B2B SaaS firm satisfied with instant & constant communication

·        Working in a small and highly efficient team of individuals with high expectations

·        This role opens many career paths in general management as well as customer success, sales, partnerships etc…

·        Smart & quick learners with interest in the mechanics of large businesses and a strong inclination to respond effectively & immediately should apply.
